name: Emulcore® EC 50
description: Emulcore® EC 50 is composed of a proprietary blend of surfactants, combining both anionic and nonionic agents, making it the recommended emulsifier for EC formulations. Serving as an O/W emulsifier, it finds utility across various formulations, technical applications, and solvents. Emulcore® EC 50 specifically acts as an oil adjuvant emulsifier. It appears as a yellow to amber-colored liquid and is easily dispersible in water.
